thread.section_title: Dragonimage Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Dragonimage | dragonimage.com.au
thread.title: Andrew

author: Andrew
title: Andrew
text:
Every time I deal with Dragon Image they always provide excellent customer service and give that little extra touch that keeps bringing me back.
I called this morning and spoke to James to confirm my online order was still scheudled for delivery today. There seemed to have been a hiccup and it was scheduled for tomorrow. James was great, he quickly put my on hold to see what could be done and came back to say that he would organise the order to come today.
In addition, when the order arrived the blue velvet backdrop purchased had already been attached and wound to the metal rods which cut down my installation time. Not to mention the clamps had been screwed to the mounting brackets as well - fantastic!
